analysis.description:
MainframeStake.destroy (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#261-262) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == 0)

Reentrancy in MainframeStake.refundBalances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#235-247):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_address,balances[_address]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#243)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#247)

Reentrancy in MainframeStake.withdraw (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#201-212):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(toAddress,withdrawAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#203)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#204-207)

MainframeStake.deposit (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#186-196) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(fromAddress,this,depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#187-188)

MainframeStake.withdraw (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#201-212) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(toAddress,withdrawAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#203)

MainframeStake.refundBalances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#235-247) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address,balances[_address]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#243)

MainframeStake.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#247-261) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,drainAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#260)

MainframeStake.refundBalances has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_address,balances[_address]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#243)

Reentrancy in MainframeStake.deposit (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#186-196):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(fromAddress,this,depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#187-188)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#188-193)
	- totalDepositBalance (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#193-194)

Reentrancy in MainframeStake.refundBalances (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#235-247):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_address,balances[_address]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#243)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDepositBalance (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#244-245)

Reentrancy in MainframeStake.withdraw (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#201-212):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(toAddress,withdrawAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#203)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDepositBalance (/unique_chucks/11/0xe3c2130530d77418b3e367fe162808887526e74d.sol#207-208)
